website_summaries.verdict: With 6 different resistance strengths to choose from, this jump trainer works for anyone.
pros: This affordable jump trainer is well made
Different resistance band options mean you can find the right fit for your height and workout style
Customers find this jump trainer easy to use for a variety of workouts
cons: Some reports that the belt can pull uncomfortably on the waist

customer_reviews.title: I was pleased with it quality and it has held up well ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a product similar to this for a while now. When I received it, I was pleased with it quality and it has held up well even now! Would suggest this for anyone who wants to push themselves in their workouts!
customer_reviews.author: Andres Garfio

customer_reviews.title: Best product of its kind in terms of price and ...
customer_reviews.text: Best product of its kind in terms of price and quality. I’ve had the skilz jump trainer. And it broke at my own fault but it broke very easily and nothing could be down about it. It’s also overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Been using it for several weeks now and can feel ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for several weeks now and can feel my hips getting stronger. No issues with delivery, item as described.
customer_reviews.author: Thor31x

customer_reviews.title: Great portable core wirkout
customer_reviews.text: Great portable leg workout for home work or where ever
customer_reviews.author: still waiting

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great training for the legs - want to jump higher - these should help!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic piece of equipment and much better quality than the "booty belt" on the market
customer_reviews.author: Ivory Lukens

customer_reviews.title: The device is effective once I am able to secure ...
customer_reviews.text: The device is effective once I am able to secure it around my waist. The issue is making it secure around the waist without it being too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen A. Levant

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use it as an additional form of plyometric training for my son who plays basketball.
customer_reviews.author: new_O

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is the best investment that I've ever made period
customer_reviews.author: Yunior Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Lovee it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome.. I been using it for 3 months now & my put is perfect & round !!
customer_reviews.author: Lovelyme

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for rehab walking exercise due to a stroke, I like it, just wish that it had more resistance band.
customer_reviews.author: lawrence parker

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It's a fair price and makes working ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It's a fair price and makes working out at home so easy. Comes with a tidy little bag too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I found this and thought it would be just as good. It works fine but I feel it doesn’t ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t want to pay $100 for the booty belt. I found this and thought it would be just as good. It works fine but I feel it doesn’t have enough tension. If you’re able to switch out the bands, I haven’t looked into it yet. It doesn’t come with any instructions or suggested exercises. I had to look online for exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S.

customer_reviews.title: Hopeful
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it for my daughter. Hoping it works as intended. Be aware that it does not come with any instructions, no stretches or exercises, no guidelines on how to get the best results from it. Just the unit itself.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work right - not the same as the booty belt
customer_reviews.author: The_Kim_Kelley

customer_reviews.title: its good. I don't like the feeling of the cords ...
customer_reviews.text: its good. I don't like the feeling of the cords pulling on my butt as I stretch it out, but no one's ever comfortable in a workout process.
customer_reviews.author: Julz

customer_reviews.title: medium difficulty which is great for a quick workout
customer_reviews.text: well made, medium difficulty which is great for a quick workout. The band does pull down a little bit, so I wear my back supporter to have some extra cushion on my hips.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Mullen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product but the how to could be a lot better
customer_reviews.author: John Brown

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: It's made worn. The belt pulls on your waist and not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Allen-Brooks

customer_reviews.title: for people 5'0 and below?
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I am doing something wrong bc I can imagine only midgets can use these successfully due to the short strap.
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: and it is a good fit for my 5' 10" height
customer_reviews.text: Being a 2nd degree black belt in Kuk Sool Hapkido, I bought this to give resistance to my plyometrics for aerial kicking, breakfalls, etc. I have tried it on, with the 100 pd bands, and it is a good fit for my 5' 10" height. It seems to be well made considering the rep that the Chinese have for poor quality (I have had no real big issues on that account yet)., I would say, at this point, that the purchase is a good option for those wishing plyometric resistance equipment. The main drawback is that you cannot purchase bands alone. In that regard, look to compatibility elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: KrazeeCanuck

customer_reviews.title: Not a good design
customer_reviews.text: I find it very difficult to keep it on my waist. It always wants to slide down when in use.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: though they are useless when the waist belt doesn't fit
customer_reviews.text: The waist strap are not big enough for many of my athletes. It's very frustrating when you purchase a product that isn't made to fit your stronger, larger athletes.The product should state the waist size of the athletes will fit. I even purchases the stronger bands to go with the product, though they are useless when the waist belt doesn't fit. We tried connecting them to our powerlifting belts, but to no avail. Coach V.
customer_reviews.author: Bstrong

customer_reviews.title: Missing belt
customer_reviews.text: Bought nearly 2 years ago for my teenage girls for Christmas. It all got pushed to storage before ever being used. 2 years later they now want sone kind of hump stretch. I pull out this product and missing the belt for this.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it however it makes my waistline ache from the pulling.
customer_reviews.author: ❤

customer_reviews.title: I give this no stars it was a total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I give this no stars it was a total waste of money. The straps are not long enough to hook to the belt.
customer_reviews.author: monetta scott

customer_reviews.title: can't wait to use it..
customer_reviews.text: Good product, I can't wait to use it . i received the product in less then 24 hours in good condition. product is good quality and looks exactly as description. I totally recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Timi

customer_reviews.title: Thank you U-Easy
customer_reviews.text: I promised a review update after a week however it has been almost a month since I have been using this item and it is great. Not only has it made me more active, of course with couple other equipments but it made my thighs/legs stronger and I can see a big difference in my body and stamina. Thank you again U-Easy
customer_reviews.author: Mina

product_meta.title: Ueasy Bounce Trainer Training Device Jump Trainer Leg Strength and Agility Training Strap
product_meta.description:
Ueasy Bounce trainer training device Leg strength and agility training strap 
Play a very active role in the basketball and volleyball training jumping sports training needs 
From a biomechanical point of view to improve the leg strength to do anything you can do to achieve the squat action or participate in any sport, for enhancing the jump, speed and strength are very helpful with rubber foot ring / ring is adjustable wrist, snap Department can add more elastic rope to increase resistance.

Specifications: elastic rope length 35 cm total length 40CM 
One hundred double color elastic rubber imports 
Material: fabric protector strong latex tube + percentage 
Name: Bounce trainer stretching leg resistance training device Trainer 

NOTES:
WAISTBAND is adjustable, maximum adjustable to 37.7inch/ 96cm. 
Ueasy Jumping trainer bands suit for 165cm to 185cm height person. Over 190cm height person not recommended.
